Signs and', 'symptoms may include headache, fever, facial flushing, pruritus, myalgia, nausea, chest', 'tightness, dyspnea, vomiting, erythema, abdominal discomfort, diaphoresis, shivers,', 'hypertension, lightheadedness, hypotension, palpitations, and somnolence.
